title: Spring Birch Freshwater Pearl Statement Necklace
description:
Dangling from branches of the Spring Birch tree, flowering catkins inspired designer Michael Michaud to recreate the beautiful, tiny flowers in bronze and freshwater pearls. Each piece is cast and burnished by hand in New York, for a deep patina finish. Shimmering chain in gold finish.

  • Dimensions: 16 in. long with extension 
  •                      pendant 3 x 2 in.
